# SpotifyVoiceCommander 

## About

SpotifyVoiceCommander is a small plugin for managing spotify by voice. Currently, the interface and management are only in Russian

## Features

* Song selection
* Changing sound volume (TBD)

## Technology stack

[![.NET][shields-dotnet]](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/) </br>
[![MAUI][shields-maui]](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/apps/maui) </br>
[![Blazor][shields-blazor]](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/apps/aspnet/web-apps/blazor) </br>
[![MudBlazor][shields-mudblazor]](https://mudblazor.com/) </br>
[![Fluxor][shields-fluxor]](https://github.com/mrpmorris/Fluxor/) </br>
[![YARP][shields-yarp]](https://github.com/microsoft/reverse-proxy) </br>
[![Yandex Cloud][shields-yandex-cloud]](https://yandex.cloud/) </br>
[![Feature-Sliced Design][shields-fsd-domain]](https://feature-sliced.design/) </br>
